channel.title: Most baddass Video game character EVER!
channel.description:
While I admit the last time I made a thread along these lines it didn't turn out so well. However! ever the optimist I be I'm restarting it with a new spin.
Post an image of who you think is the most baddass video game character, hero or villain, I don't care and you must of course say why you think he/she/it is the greatest ever.
Starting off I present Captain Gabriel Angelos from Dawn of War
![GabrielAngelos.jpg|690x500](upload://ehdRKKkNtO3HXKbkJPbmB38dqB6.jpeg)
Why you ask, simple it's because he is an eight foot tall avatar of death with centuries of experience in the fine art dishing out pain and has faced everything from Greater Daemons to thousand year old super-psychers and to top it all of he is a tactical genius capable of commanding everything from a squad to the entire chapter. his very motto shows how baddass he is "I fear no evil for I am fear incarnate"
compare that to a civvie in an garish orange suit and a man with a mere decade of combat experience
p.s. anybody who posts either the one free man or the chief will get screamed at. I really don't want another whinging fest about which is better.

item.title: Most baddass Video game character EVER!
item.dc:creator: AI13
item.description:
Fear 2: Project Origin Spoiler Alert! (if you don’t already know the story…)

Alma, simply because she is the only character who has literally raped me at the end of a game. A feat she accomplished despite being starved to death, imprisoned, shot, kicked, punched, and possibly nuked. Oh, and she can rip you apart with her mind, from a few miles away, while buried in a bunker, surrounded by shields, dead. She is the only character that I know of that gets more dangerous and more powerful the more people try to end her. Her Father killed her, that just pissed her off in a way that even shames Commander Shepard (I am surprised I haven’t seen Shepard mentioned to be honest). The sum total of the Point Man’s efforts was to kill her son, and make her horny. As for Becket, well, he just manages to knock her up. Sorry Duke, you just don’t compare.
https://ui05.gamespot.com/36/hotalma_2.jpg
Image is linked because some may find it offensive.

Read full topic

item.title: Most baddass Video game character EVER!
item.dc:creator: mrfohlin
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Why “Old Snake” specifically?
Sure, he’s old and can still kick ass, but why exclude the rest of his life as a badass hero?

He was badass during his “youth” but became badass when he became Old Snake.

item.title: Most baddass Video game character EVER!
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
I posted that before you, but you are correct. I believe you also proclaimed your love for nerds in that thread.
SPOILERZ!!![/SIZE]

After playing Metal Gear Solid 4, I would like to add Naomi Hunter to the list.
Judging by what you put as your “Location” and Naomi’s accent, I assume British women have a thing for nerds. Then again, Naomi is actually from Zimbabwe and they dropped her accent in Twin Snakes and Guns of the Patriots, so hell if I know.
Then again, she’s also fictional, which renders my entire anylysis completely pointless other than to show off how much of a Metal Gear nerd I am.

/SPOILERZ!!![/SIZE]
Anyway, I now nominate Scott Shelby from Heavy Rain as the most badass video game character ever.

He may not look like much, but his total badassery is showed off in the “Face to Face” chapter.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a0huGZDKg4I

Read full topic

item.title: Most baddass Video game character EVER!
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Big Boss because he took on the entire fucking arm of the Russian GRU forces by himself.
mind you his clone, (oops spoiler alert) Solid Snake, has done far more than that but when you remember that Snake Eater (another spoiler alert for anyone who’s not completed it) takes place in the 1960s, you end up considering Big Boss an old, Bad-ass motherfucker.

Read full topic
